title.narrative: Project Operation Center Industrial Parties in Aden (Phase II).

description.narrative: 1- Localizing prosthetic services in the governorate of Aden, providing life-support, compensatory, humanitarian, health assistance, and their involvement in society for those affected by the Yemeni crisis and following up on their cases. 2- Building the capabilities of the medical and technical staff professionally and scientifically and raising their capabilities to deal with specific cases. 3- Limiting the migration of specialized medical and technical personnel.

Assess the need for amputations to coincide with the actual need. Manufacture and installation of all kinds of prosthetic limbs and provide functional rehabilitation service before and after the fitting of prostheses, follow-up and use them in community service.

• The steadfastness of the medical and technical staff and the limit of immigration for (46) medical and technical staff with the localization of the service. • Further strengthening the empowerment of Yemeni cadres for the first phase by qualifying an additional (45) Yemeni trainees to work in the field of prosthetic limb manufacturing and physical and psychological rehabilitation. • Manufacture and installation of 300 new prostheses (lower-upper). • Follow-up and repair of (300) injured. • The provision of a therapeutic center specialized in mental health equipped with all treatment means. Psychological rehabilitation for (400) injured and sick patients.
